tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Pittsburgh Penguins vs. Nashville Predators: Game Highlights) 2025/11/14 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Steven Stamkos scored 44 seconds into overtime to rally the Nashville Predators to a 2-1 win over the Pittsburgh Penguins on Friday in the opening game of the NHL's Global Series in the Swedish capital.
headlines.shortLinkText: Stamkos scores in OT, the Predators rally to beat Penguins 2-1 in Global Series in Stockholm

headlines.description: — Sebastian Aho scored 4:29 into overtime to give the Carolina Hurricanes a 4-3 win over the Vancouver Canucks on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Aho scores in OT to lift Hurricanes to 4-3 win over Canucks

events.name: Philadelphia Flyers at St. Louis Blues

tracking.trackingName: NHL_One-Play (Philadelphia Flyers vs. St. Louis Blues: Game Highlights) 2025/11/15 ESHEET

headlines.description: — Trevor Zegras had two goals and an assist in regulation, then got the only score in the shootout to give the Philadelphia Flyers a 6-5 win against the St. Louis Blues on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Zegras has 2 goals and assist, gets winner in shootout as Flyers beat Blues 6-5

events.name: New York Islanders at Utah Mammoth

headlines.description: — Matthew Schaefer scored on a slap shot 2:08 into overtime to become the youngest player to score an overtime goal in a regular-season NHL game and the New York Islanders beat the Utah Mammoth 3-2 on Friday night for their third straight extra-time...
headlines.shortLinkText: Schaefer scores in OT to give Islanders 3-2 win over Mammoth for 4th straight victory
